marketing.tagline: the Bible that goes with you anywhere
marketing.plans copy: Bible Plans help you engage with God's Word every day, a little at a time.
marketing.versions copy: Select any Bible verse or passage, linked directly to any of YouVersionâ€™s 1,200+ versions, in 900+ languages. People viewing your Event can tap your reference to see it in their Bible App reader, where they can Bookmark it, Highlight it, and more.
marketing.bible heading: Get a free Bible for your phone, tablet, and computer.

experience.body: Choose from more than 1,200 Bible versions in over 900 languages on your computer, phone, or tablet -- with many available as audio Bibles.
experience.title: Experience it anywhere

make yours.body: Highlight or Bookmark your favorite verses, make Verse Images that you can share, and attach public or private Notes to Bible passages.
make yours.title: Make it your Bible

install now.body: The Bible App is completely free, with no advertising and no in-app purchases. It's been installed on this many unique devices (so far):
install now.title: Install the App Now

marketing.verse action copy: Highlight or Bookmark your favorite verses, make Verse Images that you can share, and attach public or private Notes to Bible passages.
marketing.download app copy: Tens of millions of people are using the Bible App™ to make God's Word a part of their daily lives. Download the free app and access your bookmarks, notes, and reading plans from anywhere. Enjoy hundreds of versions, including audio, all on your mobile device.
